accounts.name: fee_handler
docs: This account is validated against `config.fee_handler`.

accounts.name: destination_address
docs: order. This account is validated in instruction.

accounts.name: fee_handler_token_account
docs: The associated token account of fee handler of the intent program

accounts.name: destination_token_account
docs: The assocaited token account derived from `destination_address`.

accounts.name: signer_token_account
docs: The token account of the signer

accounts.name: config
docs: The configuration account, which stores important settings for the program.
This account is initialized only once during the lifetime of program and it will
throw error if tries to initialize twice

accounts.name: native_vault_account
docs: The vault account that holds native SOL token

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account that signs and pays for the transaction. This account is mutable
because it will be debited for any fees or rent required during the transaction.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The solana system program account, used for creating and managing accounts.

accounts.name: solver
docs: This account is validated against `fill.solver`.

accounts.name: solver_token_account
docs: The solver token account

accounts.name: native_vault_account
docs: Vault native account

accounts.name: token_vault_account
docs: Vault token account

accounts.name: config
docs: The configuration account, which stores important settings for the program.
This account is mutable because the admin of the program will be updated.

accounts.name: admin
docs: The account that signs and pays for the transaction. This account is checked
against the `config.admin` to ensure it is valid.

accounts.name: config
docs: The configuration account, which stores important settings for the program.
This account is mutable because the fee handler of the protocol will be updated.

accounts.name: admin
docs: The account that signs and pays for the transaction. This account is checked
against the `config.admin` to ensure it is valid.

accounts.name: config
docs: The configuration account, which stores important settings for the program.
This account is mutable because the fee handler of the protocol will be updated.

accounts.name: admin
docs: The account that signs and pays for the transaction. This account is checked
against the `config.admin` to ensure it is valid.

errors.name: InvalidFeeHandler
errors.msg: Fee handler account is not valid

errors.name: CreatorMustBeSigner
errors.msg: Signer must be a swap creator

errors.name: FeeHandlerTokenAccountIsMissing
errors.msg: Fee handler token account is missing

errors.name: OrderFinishedAccountMustNotBeSpecified
errors.msg: Order finished account must not be specified

errors.name: VaultTokenAccountMustNotBeSpecified
errors.msg: Vault token account must not be specified

errors.name: ConfigAccountMustNotBeSpecified
errors.msg: Config account must not be specified

fields.name: order_bytes
docs: Encoded order data

fields.name: id
docs: ID of the order being filled

fields.name: order_bytes
docs: Encoded order data

fields.name: solver
docs: Address of the solver filling the order

types.name: SendMessage
docs: Emitted when a cross-chain message is sent

types.name: SwapIntent
docs: Emitted when a new swap intent is created

fields.name: id
docs: Unique identifier for each order

fields.name: emitter
docs: Address of emitter contract

fields.name: src_nid
docs: Network ID of the source chain

fields.name: dst_nid
docs: Netword ID of the destination chain

fields.name: creator
docs: Address of the user who created the swap order

fields.name: destination_address
docs: Address where the swapped token should be sent

fields.name: token
docs: Address of the token to be swapped

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of the token to be swapped

fields.name: to_token
docs: Address of the token to receive on the destination chain

fields.name: to_amount
docs: Amount of `to_token` expected to be received

fields.name: data
docs: Additional data for the swap
